short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want a better new tab window? Here you go.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a simplistic, customizable New Tab page to help you be more productive and organized.
You can add custom background, create bookmarks for websites and keep track of your recent notes. Also adds a quick search bar with a variety of search engines to choose from (Google, Ecosia, DuckDuckGo, Startpage, Qwant).
In your custom new tab you can also customize a clock. Toggle the format of the clock to show or hide seconds, format as 24h clock or as am/pm. You can also show and hide the current date, which can also be formatted to your liking.
The notes also support some advanced text editing features, like automatically extending lists on new line or composite characters like ->/â†’. When holding the ALT key you can also move lines with the arrows or duplicate them by holding shift as well. 
Furthermore supports German language.
